resources.string: This is a weather app to see the type of weather and temperatures of different cities all over the world. You can add as many cities as you would like and display the information about them. \n\n You can also view this app in a Light Mode or a Dark Mode, whichever you\'d prefer.
Click the button to switch to Dark Mode
This will switch the app to a dark colour scheme using a green and grey which would be more visually pleasing for some.
Click the Button to switch to Light Mode
This will switch the app to use a light mode colour scheme of a white background and will be easier to read for some.
